name: Sayama Kaoru 狭山薫 in Yakuza: Like a Dragon 龍が如く
description:
"The deuteragonist of Yakuza 2/Yakuza Kiwami 2, and a minor character in Yakuza 3. She is the lead detective of the Osaka Police's Division Four."
